name: Blockhead Breakout
description:
This is my game for the GMTK Game Jam 2021!  The theme for this jam was Joined Together.  In this game you have to help two blockheads get to the exit!  But they're tied together, of course, and one is much larger than the other.   Let me know what you think of my short 3 level platformer.  Thanks!

Note:  This game supports both keyboard and gamepad, but it might be more enjoyable with a game pad.
